pages.text: The Blizz is a mob that spawns in cold biomes. It has 10 hearts and deals 3.5 hearts of damage at close range. It shoots projectiles which deal 2.5 hearts of damage and apply the Chilled effect. It has a chance to drop Blizz Cubes, which can be crafted or pulverized into Blizz Powder.
pages.title: Blizz

pages.text: Chilled: Decreases movement speed by 30% and attack damage by 1.5 hearts per level.
